snippet: At least seven more scientists have resigned in protest of the Cancer Prevention and Research Institute of Texas, claiming that the agency is charting a “politically driven” path that puts commercial interests first.
abstract: At least seven more scientists resign in protest from Cancer Prevention and Research Institute of Texas, claiming agency is charting 'politically driven' path that puts commercial interests first.
lead_paragraph: At least seven more scientists have resigned in protest of the Cancer Prevention and Research Institute of Texas, claiming that the agency is charting a “politically driven” path that puts commercial interests first.

headline.seo: More Scientists Quit Texas Cancer Research Institute
headline.main: 7 More Cancer Scientists Quit Texas Institute Over Grants
headline.print_headline: 7 More Cancer Scientists Quit Texas Institute Over Grants
